fieldSchema.name: CallCenterConversationAnalysis
fieldSchema.descriptions: Content, Summary, sentiment, and more analyses from a call center conversation

Duration.description: Find out how long the conversation lasted in seconds

satisfied.description: Is the customer satisfied with the agent interaction

sentiment.description: Identify the sentiment of the conversation

topic.description: Identify the single primary topic of the conversation in 6 words or less

keyPhrases.description: Identify the top 10 key phrases as comma seperated string excluding people names

complaint.description: Identify the single primary complaint of the conversation in 3 words or less
